workflows.name: Lead_Enrichment_Workflow
workflows.content:
workflow_name: "Lead Enrichment Automation"
workflow_type: "Parallel Processing"
workflow_id: "WF-PAR-001"
department: "LG"
priority: "High"
estimated_duration: "5-10 minutes per lead (automated)"
status: "Active"

description: |
  Automated lead enrichment workflow that processes multiple data sources in parallel
  to enrich lead information. Processes 37 job sites via n8n automation.
  Expected: <5% quality decrease vs manual research (acceptable trade-off).

steps:
  - step_number: 1
    name: "Lead captured from source"
    tool: "n8n workflow trigger"
    responsibility: "System (automated)"
    placement: "n8n workflow"
    duration: "Instant"
    dependencies: []
    inputs:
      - "Lead contact information"
      - "Lead source"
    outputs:
      - "Lead record created"
    success_criteria: "Lead captured and queued for enrichment"

  - step_number: 2
    name: "Parallel Processing - Multiple Enrichment Tasks"
    parallel: true
    tasks:
      - task_2a:
          name: "Company research and analysis"
          tool: "Gemini, Perplexity, GPT (parallel AI processing)"
          responsibility: "AI Assistant (automated)"
          placement: "n8n workflow - AI processing nodes"
          duration: "2-3 minutes"
          dependencies: ["Step 1"]
          inputs:
            - "Company name"
            - "Company website"
          outputs:
            - "Company size and industry"
            - "Company description"
            - "Recent news and updates"
            - "Pain points identified"
          success_criteria: "Company profile enriched with key information"

      - task_2b:
          name: "Contact verification and enrichment"
          tool: "LinkedIn API, Email verification tools"
          responsibility: "AI Assistant (automated)"
          placement: "n8n workflow - Contact enrichment nodes"
          duration: "2-3 minutes"
          dependencies: ["Step 1"]
          inputs:
            - "Contact name"
            - "Email address"
            - "LinkedIn profile URL"
          outputs:
            - "Verified email address"
            - "LinkedIn profile data"
            - "Job title and role"
            - "Decision maker status"
          success_criteria: "Contact information verified and enriched"

      - task_2c:
          name: "Social profile matching"
          tool: "Social media APIs, web scraping"
          responsibility: "AI Assistant (automated)"
          placement: "n8n workflow - Social enrichment nodes"
          duration: "2-3 minutes"
          dependencies: ["Step 1"]
          inputs:
            - "Contact name"
            - "Company name"
          outputs:
            - "Social media profiles found"
            - "Additional contact information"
            - "Company social presence"
          success_criteria: "Social profiles matched and documented"

  - step_number: 3
    name: "Lead scoring and qualification"
    tool: "Lead scoring algorithm, CRM"
    responsibility: "AI Assistant (automated)"
    placement: "CRM - Lead scoring system"
    duration: "1 minute"
    dependencies: ["Step 2a", "Step 2b", "Step 2c"]
    inputs:
      - "Enriched company data"
      - "Enriched contact data"
      - "Social profile data"
    outputs:
      - "Lead score (0-100)"
      - "BANT qualification status"
      - "MQL/SQL classification"
      - "ICP match score"
    success_criteria: "Lead scored and qualified, ready for sales handoff"

automation_details:
  platform: "n8n"
  trigger: "New lead captured"
  parallel_nodes: 3
  ai_services_used:
    - "Gemini (large datasets)"
    - "Perplexity (research)"
    - "GPT (analysis)"
  data_sources:
    - "37 job sites (automated scraping)"
    - "LinkedIn API"
    - "Company websites"
    - "Social media platforms"

quality_metrics:
  target_quality: ">95% vs manual research"
  acceptable_decrease: "<5%"
  validation_method: "Spot checks and manual review"

performance_metrics:
  time_saved: "4-5 hours/day per LG employee"
  leads_processed: "150+ qualified leads/day"
  automation_rate: "100% of deep research automated"

tags:
  - "lg"
  - "lead_generation"
  - "automation"
  - "parallel"
  - "n8n"
  - "enrichment"

version: "1.0"
created: "2025-11-01"
last_updated: "2025-11-01"

workflows.name: Old_Client_Reengagement_Workflow
workflows.content:
workflow_name: "Old Client Re-Engagement Campaign"
workflow_type: "Linear Sequential"
workflow_id: "WF-LIN-001"
department: "Sales"
priority: "High"
estimated_duration: "4-5 hours for 50 emails"
status: "Active"

description: |
  Complete workflow for re-engaging old clients (Ex_Clients) through personalized email campaign.
  Target: 50 emails/day minimum. Expected: 5-10% response rate, 1-2% reactivation rate.
  ROI: <$100 reactivation vs $1,000-3,000 new client acquisition.

steps:
  - step_number: 1
    name: "Export old client list from CRM"
    tool: "CRM export function"
    responsibility: "Sales Manager"
    placement: "Excel/Google Sheets in Sales folder"
    duration: "10 minutes"
    dependencies: []
    inputs:
      - "CRM access permissions"
    outputs:
      - "CSV/Excel file with Ex_Clients list"
      - "Contact information (email, name, company)"
      - "Last contact date"
      - "Lifetime value"
    success_criteria: "All former clients (Ex_Clients status) exported with contact info"

  - step_number: 2
    name: "Research current company status and pain points"
    tool: "GPT/NotebookLM + web search (automated via n8n)"
    responsibility: "AI Assistant (automated) or Sales Manager"
    placement: "Research Notes document per company"
    duration: "5-10 minutes per company (automated) or 15-20 minutes (manual)"
    dependencies: ["Step 1"]
    inputs:
      - "Company website URL"
      - "LinkedIn profiles"
      - "Company name"
    outputs:
      - "2-3 sentence summary of current situation"
      - "Identified pain points"
      - "Potential needs"
      - "Decision maker information"
    success_criteria: "2-3 sentence summary of current situation and potential needs"

  - step_number: 3
    name: "Generate personalized email using research insights"
    tool: "Custom GPT (email generation assistant)"
    responsibility: "Sales Manager"
    placement: "Email draft in email platform"
    duration: "2-3 minutes per email (with AI assistance)"
    dependencies: ["Step 2"]
    inputs:
      - "Research notes"
      - "Email template (reconnection/new offering/project-specific)"
      - "Company-specific details"
    outputs:
      - "Personalized email draft"
      - "Email ready for review"
    success_criteria: "Email references specific company details, pain points addressed"

  - step_number: 4
    name: "Send personalized email from corporate account"
    tool: "Email platform (Gmail)"
    responsibility: "Sales Manager"
    placement: "Sent folder, logged in CRM"
    duration: "30 seconds per email"
    dependencies: ["Step 3"]
    inputs:
      - "Finalized email"
      - "Recipient email address"
    outputs:
      - "Email sent confirmation"
      - "Email logged in CRM"
    success_criteria: "Email sent successfully, logged in CRM with date/status"

  - step_number: 5
    name: "Monitor inbox for responses and categorize"
    tool: "Email + CRM"
    responsibility: "Sales Manager"
    placement: "CRM pipeline, response tracking spreadsheet"
    duration: "2-5 minutes per response"
    dependencies: ["Step 4"]
    inputs:
      - "Email responses"
    outputs:
      - "Categorized responses (positive/negative/neutral)"
      - "Next steps assigned"
      - "CRM updated"
    success_criteria: "All responses categorized, next steps assigned"

  - step_number: 6
    name: "Send follow-up email if no response after 5-7 days"
    tool: "Email automation (n8n) or manual"
    responsibility: "System (automated) or Sales Manager (manual)"
    placement: "Automated trigger or calendar reminder"
    duration: "Automated or 2-3 minutes manual"
    dependencies: ["Step 4"]
    inputs:
      - "No response received within timeframe"
      - "Follow-up email template"
    outputs:
      - "Follow-up email sent"
      - "CRM updated with next follow-up date"
    success_criteria: "Follow-up sent, CRM updated with next follow-up date"

automation_opportunities:
  - step: 2
    automation: "n8n workflow for deep research automation"
    benefit: "Saves 4-5 hours/day per LG employee"
    status: "In Progress"

  - step: 3
    automation: "Custom GPT for email generation"
    benefit: "2-3 minutes per email vs 10-15 minutes manual"
    status: "Active"

  - step: 6
    automation: "n8n automation for follow-up sequence"
    benefit: "Automatic follow-up triggers"
    status: "Planned"

metrics:
  target_daily_emails: 50
  expected_response_rate: "5-10%"
  expected_reactivation_rate: "1-2%"
  cost_per_reactivation: "<$100"
  new_client_acquisition_cost: "$1,000-3,000"
  roi_multiplier: "10-30x"

tags:
  - "sales"
  - "re-engagement"
  - "email"
  - "old_clients"
  - "campaign"
  - "linear"

version: "1.0"
created: "2025-11-01"
last_updated: "2025-11-01"
